name: Juro Janosik (itch)
description:
Juro Janosik is an action adventure about a Slovak legendary hero. As Juro Janosik you will take the law into your own hands and take an adventure across country of Slovakia.

You will:

  • solve many puzzles, handle dangerous obstacles to get to castle
  • fight with pandurs, tie them up with rope but never kill them because you are "a good bandit"
  • gather resources like coins, food, water, secret documents to establish more bandit camps
  • search and liberate imprisoned bandits
  • give looted gold to poor hardworking villagers
  • learn something about Slovak legendary hero

Features:

  • 10 levels with real Slovak castles
  • many puzzles and dangerous obstacles
  • upgrading character skills
  • mechanic for tying up enemies
  • full gamepad support

Reviews:

“The Slovak national hero has finally received recognition in a quite solid video game, which can attract not only Slovaks.”
7/10 – Sector

“I definitely recommend to buy the Slovak title Juro Janosik!!!”
9/10 – Gamefruit

“This is a very interesting RPG, in which you will learn a little more about Juraj Jánošík. I recommend buying it.”
9/10 – Kritiky
